preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 2
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the Paprika Mayonnaise, in a large mixing bowl, combine
bullets: Mix well and reserve about half ( ¼ cup) of this mixture to a small bowl (for the dipping sauce).

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 3
bullets: Cut 1½ pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs into 2-inch pieces
Season chicken with salt and freshly cracked black pepper
Add seasoned chicken to the large bowl with remaining paprika mayonnaise and toss until evenly coated.

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 4
bullets: Using a mandolin, slice 1½ pounds baby potatoes lengthwise into ⅛-inch-thick slices
Spread the potatoes in a large sheet pan, and add 2 Tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
Spread potatoes in an even layer, placing thicker slices near the edges of the pan
Arrange chicken pieces on top of potatoes in a single layer

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 5
bullets: To the small bowl with ¼ cup of reserved paprika mayonnaise, stir to combine 1 tablespoon olive oil, ½ teaspoon of salt, and juice from half a lime

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 1
cookingSteps.mainStep: Preheat oven to 400°F (in case you missed it in the preparation)
bullets: Place sheet pan in preheated oven.
Roast chicken until it is cooked and potatoes tender (25 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 2
bullets: Garnish chicken and potatoes with chopped parsley
Serve with chilled paprika-lime dipping sauce

ingredients.name: Boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 2-inch pieces
Baby potatoes, sliced lengthwise into ⅛-inch-thick slices

Meat: 1½ pound Boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 2-inch pieces
Pantry: 1½ pound Baby potatoes, sliced lengthwise into ⅛-inch-thick slices
